attributes.action: stop forcing Catholic Adoption Bureaus also to have to give children to homo pairs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We as devout Catholics will never be able to accept homosexual marriages, Marriage is only a bond between one man and one woman according to the Catholic Teaching we adhere to. And when your Goverment makes a "law" that forces Catholic Adoption Bureaus also to give out children to homo pairs, that law discriminates against our Catholic Bureaus and that cannot be allowed.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
